version_description:
Moved the save coordinates button from the list page to the main page.
Added Apple Maps sharing option.
Added custom message footer.
Added custom map URL option.

Please report any issues or bugs by emailing the developer.

Moved the save coordinates button from the list page to the main page.
Added Apple Maps sharing option.
Added custom message footer.
Added custom map URL option.
See the help webpage for more details.

Please report any problems or bugs to the developer via email.

Moved the save coordinates button from the list page to the main page.
Added Apple Maps sharing option.
Added custom message footer.
Added custom map URL option.
Fixed iCloud export error.
See the help webpage for more details.

Please report any problems or bugs to the developer via email.

Added 'what's here' on the map page. Tap the map to get nearby addresses.
Corrected some of the new setting options that were not functioning properly namely 'Email to autofill' and 'Phone to autofill'
'Email to autofill' and 'Phone to autofill' settings can now be imported from contacts.
Faster list page scrolling and map load times.
Can make location from search result or 'what's here'. Tap the '+' button on a map search result to create a location prefilled with the information.
Corrected some .kml formatting issues, mainly the 5 XML special characters ' " > < &

Please see the help page for more details.
Please report any bugs or problems by emailing the developer.

Added 'what's here' on the map page. Tap the map to get nearby addresses.
Corrected some of the new setting options that were not functioning properly namely 'Email to autofill' and 'Phone to autofill'
'Email to autofill' and 'Phone to autofill' settings can now be imported from contacts.
Faster list page scrolling and map load times.
Can make location from search result or 'what's here'. Tap the '+' button on a map search result to create a location prefilled with the information.
Corrected some .kml formatting issues, mainly the 5 XML special characters ' " > < &

Please see the help page for more details.
Please report any bugs or problems by emailing the developer.

July, 2017 update:
Added more coordinate format options.
Added 'relative bearing and distance' to location.
Added large layout view that shows coordinates, heading, speed, and altitude.
Bug fixes and minor layout changes.
Please see the help page for details.

July, 2017 update:
Added more coordinate format options.
Added 'relative bearing and distance' to location.
Added large layout view that shows coordinates, heading, speed, and altitude.
Bug fixes and minor layout changes.
Please see the help page for details.

Please report any problems or bugs to the developer via email.

August, 2017 update:
Important fix for a long term bug that was recently discovered. If you have used the DMS (Degrees, Minutes, Seconds) format to save a location, some error was introduced. There is a way to 'undo' this error in most cases. Please see the help page for details.
Added a 'Message structure' setting. You can define how properties for each location appear in a message.
Bug fix for the custom map URL setting and kml import.
Several other minor changes explained on the help page.

August, 2017 update:
Important fix for a long term bug that was recently discovered. If you have used the DMS (Degrees, Minutes, Seconds) format to save a location, some error was introduced. There is a way to 'undo' this error in most cases. Please see the help page for details.
Added a 'Message structure' setting. You can define how properties for each location appear in a message.
Bug fix for the custom map URL setting and kml import.
Bug fix for user-entered empty strings causing crash on settings page.
Several other minor changes explained on the help page.

Please report any problems or bugs to the developer via email.

Removed the GPS requirement to make the app available for all iPads.
Note that WIFI-only (non cellular) iPads do not have a satellite GPS receiver.

December 2017:
- Added custom map pin colors. There is also a 'default pin color' setting.
- Added undo / redo functionality for important actions such as move, delete, bulk select, import kml. The undo / redo options, if any, appear near the bottom of the menu popup whilst on the list or map pages.
- If poor accuracy and Wi-Fi is disabled, the user is notified that enabling Wi-Fi may improve accuracy.
- If iPad does not have satellite GPS receiver, the user is notified.
- Added Cc and Bcc email auto-fill options.
- The search function on the list page works differently. Instead of hiding the items that do not match your search terms, now the bits matching your search terms are highlighted.
- 'Save' and 'Share' on the list page now show up to 4 options to better control which locations to export.
- Added preference setting ‘hide status bar’ that defaults to No.
- Added preference setting ‘confirm delete of single location’ that defaults to Yes. The undo / redo renders it somewhat redundant.

Please see the support page for details.

- Added support for landscape and iPad splitscreen.
- Many low-level UI changes.

Supporting all layouts required significant backend changes. Please report any issues.
Please see the support page for details.
